005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command;
006
007/**
008 * A {@link PrintCommand} is a command which prints out a string when it is initialized, and then
009 * immediately finishes. It is useful if you want a {@link CommandGroup} to print out a string when
010 * it reaches a certain point.
011 *
012 * <p>This class is provided by the OldCommands VendorDep
013 */
014public class PrintCommand extends InstantCommand {
015  /** The message to print out. */
016  private final String m_message;
017
018  /**
019   * Instantiates a {@link PrintCommand} which will print the given message when it is run.
020   *
021   * @param message the message to print
022   */
023  public PrintCommand(String message) {
024    super("Print(\"" + message + "\"");
025    m_message = message;
026  }
027
028  @Override
029  protected void initialize() {
030    System.out.println(m_message);
031  }
032}
